channel.title: Blockchain News on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Blockchain News on TechnoStreet

item.title: Ethereum transactions 338% higher in 2022 but Bitcoin remains most popular
item.description: Ethereum transactions 338% higher in 2022 but Bitcoin remains most popular The total number of transactions on the Ethereum network more than quadrupled that of Bitcoin, but Bitcoin remained the most searched cryptocurrency in 2022.

item.title: What to Expect from Crypto the Year After FTX
item.description: What to Expect from Crypto the Year After FTX Users continue to seek to divert funds away from centralized exchanges, paving the way for blockchain-based alternatives to thrive.

item.title: Litecoin [LTC]: Do not get Carried Away by these Bullish Signs
item.description: Litecoin [LTC]: Do not get Carried Away by these Bullish Signs Litecoin [LTC] holders are set to end the year on a high note, as the altcoin sees a historical increase in whale accumulation, according to Santiment data.

item.title: Shiba Inu Community Bullish for Potential 2023 Shibarium Release
item.description: Shiba Inu Community Bullish for Potential 2023 Shibarium Release The Shiba Inu community is optimistic about the new year, looking forward to the release of layer 2 Shibarium and potential new payment integrations.
